roleset.name: to isolate, isolating
roleset.note: SEQUESTER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls concealment-16, steal-10.5. (from sequester.01-v)
SEQUESTERING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, sequester.01. Corresponds to Vncls concealment-16, steal-10.5. (from sequestering.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Credit Agricole asked [a Milan court]-1 [*-1]to sequester the Nuovo Banco shares , the Italian news agency ANSA reported [0] [*T*-2] .

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: At times I sequester my mind When I must think with precision , Detached from all other thoughts While trying to reach a decision .
example.arg: When I must think with precision
Detached from all other thoughts While trying to reach a decision
